net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource

Class HttpEscape

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.HttpEscape

  • final class HttpEscape
extends Object
    Provides utilities for escaping HTTP values.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • appendAttribute

        public void appendAttribute(StringBuilder buf,
                            String name,
                            @Nullable
                            String value)
        Append a header attribute to the buffer. The buffer will become the value of an HTTP header.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer.
        name - The name of the attribute.
        value - The value of the attribute.

      • escapeAttributeValue

        @Nullable
 @Contract(value="!null->!null")
public String escapeAttributeValue(@Nullable
                                                                              String value)
        Escape an header attribute value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value.
        Returns:
        The escaped value.
